New Records: Blake Snell (2-3, 3.76 ERA) will start on the mound for the Giants, while the Marlins will counter with Adam Oller (1-1, 5.23 ERA)
Pre-Game Insights: The Giants have a 70% chance of winning according to simulations, and the Marlins are expected to cover the line as underdogs
The over/under for total runs scored is set at 7.143 with TAB, which has odds of $1.91 for the over and $1.91 for the under
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match-up between the Giants and Marlins at Oracle Park is scheduled to begin at 12:15pm AEST on Saturday.
